metadata.name: SafeBoot Registry Key Deleted Via Reg.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "reg.exe" commands with the "delete" flag on safe boot registry keys. Often used by attacker to prevent safeboot execution of security products

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('reg.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('reg.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' delete ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\system\\currentcontrolset\\control\\safeboot')))

output.summary: Detects execution of "reg.exe" commands with the "delete" flag on safe boot registry keys. Often used by attacker to prevent safeboot execution of security products
